intro.title: Your Sport Agent
intro.description: Your Sport Agent — hockey oriented, scouting platform.

slides.title: your sport agent
text: Search for new players, track candidate progress, and easily converse and share info with scouts.

slides.title: your sport agent
text: Search and follow players, keep records, and discuss candidates with your colleagues.

slides.title: your sport agent
text: An extensive database of players with complete game stats right in front of you. Track their progress and suggest working together.

slides.title: your sport agent
text: Learn how your rivals play and prep your team for the big game by analyzing key tactical moments on video.

slides.title: your sport agent
text: Career in hockey is not only work, sweat, blood and perseverance. Here important to show yourself in the right time. You will find your teammates, coach, agent and rival. You can assess yourself, learn and grow from game to game, go forward and higher.
